attributes.action: re think the divorce laws concerning pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The situation can arise that after all the equities have been split a person can insist on half the other persons pension resulting in that person having to forfeit their equity plus getting a loan for the outstanding balance and leaving them homeless, penniless and £0,000s in debt. a pension is a value on paper and not material asset, no one should be forced to take on debt and forced to live in poverty possibly for the rest of their life because the other party is greedy and they know they have the backing of the law. it can be devastating when it happens to the innocent party.
